price: Los desdichados estarán en el Infierno, donde se oirán sus alaridos y sollozos.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna shaqū fafī al-nāri lahum fīhā zafīrun washahīqun
